title: No matching distribution found for opencv-python-headless~=3.4.9.33 when installing 'deeplabcut[gui]'==2.2rc2
body:
Hi, 

Quite excited about the new maDLC. I am working in a Ubuntu 18.04 and trying to install it in a new conda environment I got this error:

```
`$ pip install 'deeplabcut[gui]'==2.2rc1
Collecting deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1
  Downloading deeplabcut-2.2rc1-py3-none-any.whl (707 kB)
     |████████████████████████████████| 707 kB 4.5 MB/s 
Requirement already satisfied: python-dateutil in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (2.8.1)
Requirement already satisfied: setuptools in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (52.0.0.post20210125)
Collecting tables
  Using cached tables-3.6.1-cp39-cp39-manylinux2010_x86_64.whl (14.3 MB)
Collecting ruamel.yaml>=0.15.0
  Using cached ruamel.yaml-0.17.10-py3-none-any.whl (108 kB)
Requirement already satisfied: ipython in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (7.22.0)
Collecting pyyaml
  Using cached PyYAML-5.4.1-cp39-cp39-manylinux1_x86_64.whl (630 kB)
Requirement already satisfied: ipython-genutils in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (0.2.0)
Requirement already satisfied: patsy in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (0.5.1)
Collecting tensorpack==0.9.8
  Using cached tensorpack-0.9.8-py2.py3-none-any.whl (288 kB)
Collecting numba==0.51.1
  Using cached numba-0.51.1.tar.gz (2.1 MB)
Requirement already satisfied: scipy>=1.4 in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (1.6.2)
Requirement already satisfied: six in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (1.15.0)
Collecting imgaug
  Using cached imgaug-0.4.0-py2.py3-none-any.whl (948 kB)
Requirement already satisfied: Pillow>=7.1 in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (8.2.0)
Requirement already satisfied: pandas>=1.0.1 in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (1.2.4)
Requirement already satisfied: scikit-learn in ./miniconda3/lib/python3.9/site-packages (from deeplabcut[gui]==2.2rc1) (0.24.1)
Collecting networkx
  Using cached networkx-2.5.1-py3-none-any.whl (1.6 MB)
Collecting moviepy<=1.0.1
  Using cached moviepy-1.0.1.tar.gz (373 kB)
Collecting cython
  Using cached Cython-0.29.23-cp39-cp39-manylinux1_x86_64.whl (1.9 MB)
**ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement opencv-python-headless~=3.4.9.33 (from deeplabcut[gui]) (from versions: 3.4.10.37, 3.4.11.39, 3.4.11.41, 3.4.11.43, 3.4.11.45, 3.4.13.47, 3.4.14.51, 3.4.14.53, 4.3.0.38, 4.4.0.40, 4.4.0.42, 4.4.0.44, 4.4.0.46, 4.5.1.48, 4.5.2.52, 4.5.2.54)
ERROR: No matching distribution found for opencv-python-headless~=3.4.9.33**`
```

Trying to install the 2.2rc1 version gives me the same error.
